name: places/ChIJZ-DbL4xYwokRtQ_t1dQpUBI
formattedAddress: 146 Central Park W #1f, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 146 Central Park W #1f, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Nnadi is excellent. He is the most thorough psychiatrist I have ever had with adjusting my medication and understanding what I need. I have never felt he was rude or unprofessional in any way. I think any doctor may be a bit frustrated by patients being late for appointments. I enjoy talking to him and always gain great insight. He is a kind man and a wonderful doctor. If you need help, this is your doc.

text.text: Dr. Nnadi is excellent. He is the most thorough psychiatrist I have ever had with adjusting my medication and understanding what I need. originalText.text: I was a patient of Dr Nnadis for almost two years. I recently missed an appointment I was a no show no call and I swear before GOD this was the first time. I had fell into a really bad depression to the point where I could not even lift my hand to shower myself. When I started feeling better a couple of days later. I called Dr Nnadi to reschedule my appointment. I was told by his secretary that to schedule another appointment I would have to pay $100.00. I explained to her that I didn’t have it. I make 38k a year and I’m a single parent. I understand that none of this is anyone’s problem. I asked her to have Dr Nnadi call me which he never did. My mom called him as well he never called either of us back. I don’t understand why I wasn’t at least given the opportunity to at least make a payment arrangement. It’s just so sad that everything is all about money. I’ve had appointments with this man for over almost a full two years and this is the treatment I get. I was wanting to change my Prescription because the medicine is not working for me anymore. I’ve been so down lately I have been considering suicidal. I have called and left numerous messages for other physiatrists but I haven’t found anyone yet and I’m just so upset that people don’t care about people. Everything is not about money. My life is more valuable than a lousy $100.00.

originalText.text: I was a patient of his for almost 2 years, and after reading some of the other reviews, I'm not shocked, but disappointed.  I was 10 minutes late for an appointment, but he was also still in session with another patient. He briefly came out of his office with a lost look on his face. I said I had an appointment.  I waited for 10 minutes and ended up leaving because I had to go to work. I texted him saying I had to leave because I needed to go to work, and he texted me back saying I was late! I couldnt believe it! Then said he didnt believe I was there for 10 minutes and his assistant would have told him. So, now I'm a liar. I explained that I was 10 minutes late, but h also was lat , as he still had the previous patient in his office while I sat and waited. Then he texts me and says I need to "stop it."  This "doctor" is very unprofessional and rude. I dont understand how you can be a therapist, especially dealing with people who might have serious mental health issues, and be so rude and unpleasant. If you're looking for a professional doctor, keep searching.

originalText.text:
This doctor is very rude an unprofessional!!!!! After waking up 20 minutes late (honest mistake) past my appointment, I called the office to reschedule and when I asked if I could come either later in the day or reschedule, the doctor became very dismissive and his tone changed to what came across as very rude and aggressive.

This would have been my very first time meeting this doctor as I was referred by my therapist but I will now go back and ask to be referred to someone different because I DO NOT deserve the attitude and aggressiveness I recieved from this doctor.

I would not recommend anyone to his practice. Charles Nnadi comes across as pompous and has a bad attitude should not be dealing with paitients that have potential psychological problems.

originalText.text: Such an amazing Dr. He has helped my daughter with so much. He is so kind and understanding and very comfortable to talk to. We are so lucky to have found him.
